attributes.action: Remove the XL Bully from thelist of banned dogs
attributes.additional_details:
We believe that breed-specific legislation is ineffective and unfair. The vast majority of XL Bully dogs are friendly, safe, and well cared for by responsible owners. A dog's behaviour depends on its upbringing, training, and environment, not solely on its breed.
Banning XL Bullies punishes esponsible owners and leads to the unnecessary destruction of healthy, well-socialised dogs. Instead, the Government shol cus on promotina responsible ownershin
attributes.background: We call on the UK Government to remove the XL Bully from the li list of banned dogs under the Dangerous Dogs Act 1991

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for the same action: "Reverse the ban on XL Bully dogs" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/729003
